reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 6 nigths and were very happy with the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Location, close to EVERYTHING!

reviews.text: Negatives - as mentioned by others -- no elevator and no AC, which was not a problem for us.
reviews.title: A great find for families in the centre of Paris

reviews.text: Our regular room was small, but my understanding is that all of the Paris hotels are this way.
reviews.title: Family sick in Paris - hotel to the rescue!
Terrible!!!!
reviews.text: The location is OUTSTANDING! Literally 4 minutes walk to Louvre. Close to the Opera house as well. Right down the street is a full service little grocery store where we bought things for breakfast and dinner. The room was clean, not much toiletaries... The hotel stuff is very nice, not rude like most of the people in service industry in Paris..
If you are looking for a Paris hotel to be clean, basic, inexpensive, and close to the attractions -- this is your choice.
reviews.title: excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As everyone else has said, this hotel is centrally located and fantastic. However, every taxi driver we told the address had to look at a map or GPS to find it. When we entered late at night, I rang what I thought was the front door only to see the receptionist enter from a door of an internet cafe, which oddly enough was the lobby as well? They now have an elevator for those of you who were concerned, but the Hotel website is TERRIBLY misleading and makes you think every room is beautifully done. He first gave us a key and I was shocked when I opened the door. Cracked tiles in the bathroom, old, musty room with terrible decor. I immediately went downstairs thinking I was going to switch hotels. He reluctantly gave me the key to a 'newer' room after telling him that room was not what I payed for, and that I knew they had newer rooms than that. By the way, THE PLACE IS A CONSTRUCTION SITE! Ladders up, dust everywhere, construction noise all morning and day. Our breakfast was interrupted by hammers and drilling and then finally fire alarms set off from the construction. It was completely unprofessional and I was shocked they did not even warn us or apologize for the works.
reviews.title: Good Location, and that is IT!

reviews.text: Now, the room. No english channels, and the cleanliness of room was questionable at best. There was dust on all surfaces and even after the maids had come the next day I could write my name on the bedside table in dust. I don't even know if they did anything else but change the sheets. Receptionists were fairly nice, gave directions and ordered taxi's for us, and the breakfast was decent. Other than that and the location, I was utterly disappointed and unimpressed, even coming from someone who stays in hostels a lot.
reviews.title: centrally located, stairs were a challenge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: my husband and I stayed here 8 days attending a confernence, it was the closest to my budget and being careful of my expenses as we were starting in Paris for a month-long tour of Europe so we picked this from a list of hotels we were offered...I am in love with the city so inspite of the lack of airconditioning (which was ok since April was still a cool month). no English speaking TV channel (that's fine too, we were out sightseeing anyway) and bringing the luggage up and down the stairs, all up it did not mar my memories of Europe..
reviews.title: Excellent location for tourist sites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small hotel with friendly staff at a sensible rate for the area. It would have been preferable to have information in the room with regard to hotel amenities such as breakfast and local restaurants.
reviews.title: Very disappointing...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fiance and I stayed here for two nights in September and it was a great disappointment. We actually got engaged in our room there, and I still would never return to the hotel, which is very sad. To be fair, the location is great for visiting the Louvre, and we had no problems with the cleanliness, but other than that, there were no redeeming qualities. The room and bathroom were very small, and the actual surrounding area of the hotel is not nice. We had trouble sleeping due to the noise outside. There were no English stations on the TV (we visited three other European countries during our trip, and this was the only place without any English programs.). I could overlook those things, however, were it not for the unfriendliness of the staff. The lady on the front desk, in particular, was plain rude; if she had so much as given us a smile, I probably could have let everything else go. We politely asked for directions to somewhere to eat after we arrived, and she looked at us like we were asking her to give up her firstborn. We steered clear of the desk as much as we could for the rest of the trip, but had to talk to her to pay the bill, unfortunately. She wasn't able to get either of our credit cards to work, even though they were successfully used at every other place we visited in Europe (and other locations in Paris), before and after that hotel. We finally had to pay the bill in cash, which was very inconvenient. All in all, an unpleasant experience. These people should not be in the service industry, plain and simple.
reviews.title: Good location and price but...

reviews.text: Great location. Apartment can do with some upgrade. The TV does not have any English channels. The free coffee in the apartment was really good.
reviews.title: Great location. No English hanel on TV.

reviews.text: Internet is too expensive at EUR1 for 30 minutes.
reviews.title: Location and Value

reviews.text: I fouled up my reservation, showing up a day late after extending in another town.
reviews.title: fantastic location

reviews.text: Front desk was understanding and I was able to get their one remaining room for the night, without penalty as they were able to sell my room the previous evening.
reviews.title: Good Location - Good Big Suite

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was tiny (double bed ) and I could touch my elbows to the side of the bathroom, but it was clean and I was looking for value, so no complaints.
reviews.title: Tiny room, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean and had everything we needed for our stay including free wireless internet. The location can't be beat and we will definitely return. No complaints here. Room and bathroom are compact so keep that in mind if you need more space. We didn't try the breakfast so can't comment on that.
reviews.title: Just Right

reviews.text: We stayed in the apartment and had a wonderful stay. It is within walking distance to everything. We would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Great Location, great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for four days in early July. We got a good room, near the elevator and were very happy with the service and cleanliness of the room. It was newly fitted out which helped, and it would seem the hotel is about to get a restaurant for guests etc.
reviews.title: Wonderful, best value and great location. Couldnt fault.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We never ordered room service, didnt know even know it was available. It might be, some rooms had trays outside which may be from one of the surroudning restaurants We ate out ever meal so cant review the food.
reviews.title: Location,location,location

reviews.text: Bed was comfortable. Offers free WiFi for guests. Can recommend this hotel for anyone looking to travel to Paris and spend most of their time out and about. I think all Paris hotels are too small to "live" in.
reviews.title: Perfect Location Great Value
